phrs.translation: 暮光腐化者, 暮光腐蚀者

sentences.sentence: A strange phenomenon, a corrupter himself not corrupt!
sentences.translation: 一个腐化堕落的人并不腐化堕落，真是怪事一桩！

sentences.sentence: Thus he creates the Socratic Method, as well as arousing suspicions among some citizens of Athens that he is a corrupter of youth.
sentences.translation: 苏格拉底创造了自己的传播哲学的方法，但这也同时被误解，受到了雅典人的猜疑，认为他的哲学腐蚀了年轻的一代。
